name: Sophie M.
quote: Tatikati has revolutionized our car trips! My 6-year-old daughter loves the stories and I'm delighted she can listen to them without screens.

name: Mark D.
quote: The child mode is perfect! My 4-year-old son uses the app completely independently. The content quality is exceptional.

name: Julia L.
quote: Finally an alternative to screens! The thematic playlists are well thought out and my 5-year-old twins argue less about what to choose.

name: Thomas R.
quote: The auto-resume feature is brilliant for long episodes. My daughter can pick up her story exactly where she left off.
